content: All we can do everyday is to try to respond, to stop and anulate the toughtflow, to tight up every string in our body to our mind till we feel that we are at a complete control, that may vary from gripping safe to a feeble and almost ethereal effort. Here comes another day we have to fight! And hey, this might be the day, and if it don’t, you have to understand to be thankful for you what you are and have.
